Original Sin Story ―Act 1―

原(げん)罪(ざい)物(もの)語(がたり)　(　)―(―)第(だい)1(ひと)幕(まく)―(―)genzai monogatari —dai hito-maku—

AKNP-0006

"This is the story of the beginning... From where shall I tell?"

mothy's eighth album focusing on the first half of the Original Sin Story series. The album was released on August 11, 2012, and is currently unavailable.

Playlist · Booklet

Tracklist

  1. Prophet Merry-Go-Round (instrumental)
  2. Project "Ma"
  3. Escape of Salmhofer the Witch
  4. moonlit bear (New Version)
  5. Project "Ma" (Off Vocal Version)
  6. Escape of Salmhofer the Witch (Off Vocal Version)
  7. moonlit bear (Off Vocal Version)

Notes

  • The album was illustrated by Ichika.
  • The inside of the album features a list of characters and their associated VOCALOIDs.
  • Each lyrics page in the booklet is preceded by a page of backstory for each song.
  • The end of the booklet leads up to the start of Original Sin Story —Act 2—.
